briefTitle: Long Term Effects of DPP-IV Inhibitor Treatment in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: Phase 3, Double Blinded, Placebo Controlled Study of the Effects of 12 Weeks DPP-IV Inhibitor Treatment on Secretion and Action of the Incretin Hormones in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
summary:
We wish to evaluate the effect of long term treatment with a DPP-IV inhibitor on the function of the incretin hormones

Hypothesis We hypothesize that that a gradual improvement in metabolic control induced by DPP-IV inhibitor (JanuviaÂ®) treatment significantly ameliorates the impaired secretion and potency of GLP-1 and leads to a restoration of the lost action of GIP.

primaryOutcome.measure: the Relative Increase in Meal-induced Total GLP-1 Secretion
